event.title: did not come into being until the arrival of the San Pedro, Los Angeles and Salt Lake Railroad in 1880

data.event: Although there were ranches in the area in the 1870s, Milford did not come into being until the arrival of the San Pedro, Los Angeles and Salt Lake Railroad in 1880.
On July 8 the fire was declared the largest in Utah's history, having burned more than 283,000 acres (1,150 km2).
